lines.text: Shut up, sir, Very Good, sir...
If this be a natural thing where do it come from where do it go...
If this be a natural thing where do it come from, where do it go?
When the train come tearing and a roaring through the station, with its whiskers blowing and it haunted steam up...
It's a far far wetter thing I go to.

[about a ghost story]
As they were pushing the bodies in...

[about the ghost of Ted Holmes after he trips up]
That was his other leg
Sizzle Sizzle Sizzle. I found out he'd been dead since Clapham Junction.
The ghost train never comes back.

[to parrot]
I say, I wonder if I could teach you to talk. I wonder if you could say 'Heil Hitler.' Eh? No, not with a beak like that.
